mapper.select: SELECT r.user_id AS userId, u.nickname, u.profile_img AS userProfileImg, r.id AS 'review.id', r.title AS 'review.title', r.content AS 'review.content', r.score AS 'review.score', r.user_id AS 'review.userId', r.attraction_id AS 'review.attractionId', r.created_at AS 'review.createdAt' FROM attraction_review r INNER JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.attraction_id = #{attractionId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS reviewsCount, AVG(score) AS score FROM attraction_review WHERE attraction_id = #{attractionId}
select id, title, content, score, user_id userId, attraction_id attractionId from attraction_review where user_id=#{userId}
select id, title, content, score, user_id userId, attraction_id attractionId from attraction_review where id=#{reviewId}
